LanguageData.AUD.Settings.InfiniteUDDesc: Toggle, if the event will disappear on it's own. If toggled on, you will have to destroy the noctoliths.
LanguageData.AUD.Settings.MinDurationDesc: Set the minimum duration, in days, that the event can last, if infinite darkness is not enabled.
LanguageData.AUD.Settings.MaxDurationDesc: Set the maximum duration, in days, that the event can last, if infinite darkness is not enabled.
